message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it's a fantastic deal and would be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 represents the value I place on it, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit shy of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
